问1为什么切换世界会清理背包答：请确实config中的这两个配置是取消（即设置false）   # Reset Challenges - if this is true, player's challenges will reset when they   # reset an island or if they are kicked or leave a team. Prevents exploiting the   # challenges by doing them repeatedly.   resetchallenges: false
   # Reset inventory - if true, the player's inventory will be cleared when they start   # or restart and island. Default is true.   # Note: if you have MultiInv running or a similar inventory control plugin, that   # plugin may still reset the inventory when the world changes.   resetinventory: false

楼上都是啥乱七八糟的... 

您的意思是，生存服的玩家创建空岛时背包会被清空？

如果您用的是AskyBlock的话，打开AskyBlock文件夹的config.yml文件
然后找到 resetinventory 这项，将其修改为 false 关闭即可，重启服务器即可解决
